item.title: The future of education?
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Just read that John Resig, the creator of jQuery, quit Mozilla to work for a company we'd never heard of called Kahn Academy. Can the internet change the way we educate children? Well duh of course it can - with Resig and Kahn working together looks like Kahn Academy might have it all figured out already.

The post The future of education? appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Just read that John Resig, the creator of jQuery, quit Mozilla to work for a company we’d never heard of called Kahn Academy. Can the internet change the way we educate children? Well duh of course it can – with Resig and Kahn working together looks like Kahn Academy might have it all figured out already. When you want fast broadband speed, take a moment to check this out.

The post The future of education? appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Launch: RantVan
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Everyone has something that they want to go off about. RantVan is a video studio (in a van) that travels around New York, letting people rant about a menu of topics or whatever it is that they need to get off their chest.

The post Launch: RantVan appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Everyone has something that they want to go off about. We just finished making the site for RantVan, a video studio in a van that travels around New York using boat services from this website, letting people rant about a menu of topics or whatever it is that they need to get off their chest.

If you have something that you want to get out, the Rant Van announces their location via their Twitter feed (located at the top of every page on their site), so track them down and GO OFF!

The post Launch: RantVan appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Video Update: The Recruiter
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We've just added a new page to The Recruiter site featuring a video showing what it was like for one of the main recruits (Matt) to come back home after being in Iraq for 15 months.

The post Video Update: The Recruiter appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We’ve just added a new page to The Recruiter site featuring a video showing what it was like for one of the main recruits (Matt) to come back home after being in Iraq for 15 months.

The post Video Update: The Recruiter appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Anthony Gasparro
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
Anthony Gasparro is a production designer and art director for indie films. He wanted us to create a fun portfolio site with a technical look. We chose a graph for the background to give a subtle reference to the design aspect of his work. Website Design Anthony Gasparro on IMDB

The post Anthony Gasparro appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
Anthony Gasparro is a production designer and art director for indie films. He wanted us to create a fun portfolio site with a technical look. We chose a graph for the background to give a subtle reference to the design aspect of his work.

Website Design

Anthony Gasparro on IMDB

The post Anthony Gasparro appeared first on mimoYmima.
